definition[0]: an area for birds or animals where they are protected and cannot be hunted
example[0]: The park is the largest wildlife sanctuary in the US.
definition[1]: a peaceful place that is safe and provides protection, especially for people who are in danger
example[2]: Fleeing refugees found sanctuary in Geneva.
definition[2]: the part of a religious building that is considered to be the most holy
definition[3]: the room in a religious building where religious services take place
definition[4]: the right that people had under Christian law, especially in the past, to be protected from police, soldiers etc by staying in a church
